parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the specified resource groups or members. Valid values:

*   false (default)
*   true

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource. Set the value to ALIYUN::WAF::DEFENSERESOURCE.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys. You can specify up to 20 tag keys.
